title: Skyfom Skill Composition Schema
description: Schema for defining composite skills that orchestrate multiple sub-skills

name.description: Unique name for this composite skill

description.description: Brief description of what this composite skill does

executionMode.description: How sub-skills are executed: parallel (all at once), sequential (one after another), hybrid (respects dependencies)

maxParallel.description: Maximum number of sub-skills to execute in parallel

subSkills.description: Array of sub-skills that comprise this composite skill

skillName.description: Name of the sub-skill to invoke (must exist in skills/ directory)

role.description: Specific role this sub-skill plays in the composition

dependencies.description: List of other sub-skill names this skill depends on (must complete first)

required.description: Whether this sub-skill must complete successfully (true) or is optional (false)

tokenEstimate.description: Estimated token usage for this sub-skill

inputs.description: Input data to pass to this sub-skill

outputs.description: Names of outputs this sub-skill produces for other sub-skills to consume

coordinationStrategy.description: How the composite skill coordinates sub-skills

errorHandling.description: What to do when a required sub-skill fails

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for each sub-skill (0 = no timeout)

resultsAggregation.description: How to aggregate results from multiple sub-skills
